text: And the Gentiles shall take them, and bring them into their place: and they shall 14. 2 i. e. the Israelites.inherit them, and 14. 2 i. e. the Gentiles.they shall be multiplied upon the land for servants and handmaidens: and they that took them captives shall become captives to them; and they that had lordship over them shall be under their rule.
